title: BiEntity Condition
description:
Item Action Types operate on a stack of items. These are available to power/action types that provides an item_action object field.
Type: 'origins:damage'
- Damages the item stack with a specified amount.

damage.description: The amount of damage it should do to the item stack.

ignore_unbreaking.description: Determines if this action should ignore the Unbreaking enchantment.
